nodes.text: A city was located on the planet Bal'demnic, containing Kon'meas Spaceport. In 67 BBY, the Muun Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Plagueis visited the city after killing his Bith master, Darth Tenebrous. After searching the city for transportation off the planet, Plagueis stowed aboard the freighter Woebegone.
